**Support**

You always have a way of getting help. Whether it's LiveChat, Ticket, Phone, Email, Skype, Discord, and Telegram. We also perform routine checkups to ensure you are happy with your server!

**Control Panel**

We provide a secure, fast, smooth, and easy to use control panel with every dedicated server. Our control panel gives you the ability to:

Track Bandwidth (usage graphs)
Organize IPs
Access KVM Console (IPMI/IDRAC)
